ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Two the Dead of Night; Chapter Three Offerings
ComicInfo.Summary:
Chapter Two the Dead of Night: Mahasti pays Kane a visit while Silent is interrupted in his search.
Chapter Three Offerings: Kane and the Baron discover another corpse.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-29 09:00:54. [CVDB141317] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:17:59. [Issue ID 545951]
